title: everyone else connecting to chat before me
body:
Is anyone else getting into the champion select chat after everyone else?

I'm pretty sure its just the alpha client because i get into chat normally when I'm on the normal client

replies.body: I've found the same. And problems with selecting champs. Internets fine.
Yeah I am having the same problem when selecting champs, it has that annoying windows loading mouse icon on the champ. Either I have to wait, or click on it a few times for it to select.
I've noticed that as well, although in my experience the delay is very minimal (<2 seconds)
I just made a post talking about that as well. I think it is just a connection problem to the client (don't take my word for it). I think everyone is getting the same problem.
Yep same for me as well.
